loc_brb_cbf_01.base_text: Dear Friends, we're going back to New York. Theres something buried in the foundation of the old Brooklyn Bank that Bain was after. Could be a way out of this current predicament we're in. While we're there, it might be a good idea to pick up some extra operating cash to keep us going. Replacing all of Bain's equipment isn't going to be cheap I can tell you, and the stuff I've got running as backup isn't going to hold up for long, yeah? At the moment, we're open targets.

loc_pex_37_01.loc_text: We need to get him out of that prisoner outfit. Find him a spare police uniform!

loc_pex_40_01.base_text: Okay, our friend will know the way out, right? You just have to watch out for the guards.
loc_pex_40_01.loc_text: Okay, our friend will know the way out, right? You just have to watch out for the guards.

loc_pex_43_01.base_text: Good! Now steal one of the police cars and get out of there.
loc_pex_43_01.loc_text: Good! Now steal one of the police cars and get out of there.

loc_pex_45_01.base_text: You need to figure out which key goes with his car. This would really be easier if we could just take any car.
loc_pex_45_01.loc_text: You need to figure out which key goes with his car. This would really be easier if we could just take any car.

loc_pex_52_01.base_text: That's a proper jailbreak, my friends!
loc_pex_52_01.loc_text: That's a proper jailbreak, my friends!

loc_pex_53_05.base_text: That doesn't sound good! Be ready to fight!
loc_pex_53_05.loc_text: That doesn't sound good! Be ready to fight!

loc_pex_end_stealth_01.base_text: Nice job, sneaking Vlad's dwankie brother-in-law out of there. Maybe he will stay out of trouble in the future, yeah? (Heh.. not likely...)
loc_pex_end_stealth_01.loc_text: Nice job, sneaking Vlad's dwankie brother-in-law out of there. Maybe he will stay out of trouble in the future, yeah? (Heh.. not likely...)

loc_pex_intro_02.base_text: You need to get in there, get our man out, and destroy whatever incriminating evidence the kerels are keeping on him. Got it?
loc_pex_intro_02.loc_text: You need to get in there, get our man out, and destroy whatever incriminating evidence the kerels are keeping on him. Got it?

loc_skm_01_01.base_text: Ok, keep our little V.I.P. dwankie safe and out of trouble.
loc_skm_01_01.loc_text: Ok, keep our little V.I.P. dwankie safe and out of trouble.

loc_skm_01_02.base_text: Right, friends, let's keep our hostage out of trouble and safe, yeah?
loc_skm_01_02.loc_text: Right, friends, let's keep our hostage out of trouble and safe, yeah?

loc_skm_01_03.base_text: Great, we got our quarry. Make sure the chop stays secure.
loc_skm_01_03.loc_text: Great, we got our quarry. Make sure the chop stays secure.

loc_skm_05_01.base_text: Blerrie, They're sending in Cuff Cloakers along with this group.
loc_skm_05_01.loc_text: Blerrie, They're sending in Cuff Cloakers along with this group.

loc_skm_05_02.base_text: Ach, and they're sending in Cuff Cloakers now.
loc_skm_05_02.loc_text: Ach, and they're sending in Cuff Cloakers now.

loc_skm_07_01.base_text: Watch out, friends. LMG Dozers are coming!
loc_skm_07_01.loc_text: Watch out, friends. LMG Dozers are coming!

loc_skm_07_02.base_text: Looks like LMG Dozers are part of the assault this time.
loc_skm_07_02.loc_text: Looks like LMG Dozers are part of the assault this time.

loc_skm_09_01.base_text: Kerels are sending in Medic Dozers with this round.
loc_skm_09_01.loc_text: Kerels are sending in Medic Dozers with this round.

loc_skm_09_02.base_text: Medic Dozers coming as well. Bunch of kakspul!
loc_skm_09_02.loc_text: Medic Dozers coming as well. Bunch of kakspul!

loc_skm_10_01.base_text: The incoming group has Minigun Dozers!
loc_skm_10_01.loc_text: The incoming group has Minigun Dozers!

loc_skm_10_02.base_text: They're sending in Minigun Dozers too!
loc_skm_10_02.loc_text: They're sending in Minigun Dozers too!

loc_skm_19_01.base_text: Ok, you made it so far and the kerels have made an offer. I think we can hold out for more.
loc_skm_19_01.loc_text: Ok, you made it so far and the kerels have made an offer. I think we can hold out for more.

loc_skm_19_02.base_text: Look like the chops are ready to talk, but we can squeeze them for more cash if you just keep going.
loc_skm_19_02.loc_text: Look like the chops are ready to talk, but we can squeeze them for more cash if you just keep going.

loc_skm_19_03.base_text: There's an offer on the table. Not enough in Locke's humble opinion. Let's hold out for more, yeah?
loc_skm_19_03.loc_text: There's an offer on the table. Not enough in Locke's humble opinion. Let's hold out for more, yeah?

loc_skm_19_04.base_text: Look at that. The kerels must think we're idiots, making an offer so low. Let's see how far they will go, yeah?
loc_skm_19_04.loc_text: Look at that. The kerels must think we're idiots, making an offer so low. Let's see how far they will go, yeah?

loc_skm_19_05.base_text: The domkops are trying to get off cheapsies with that offer, yeah? We can get more if we just don't give up.
loc_skm_19_05.loc_text: The domkops are trying to get off cheapsies with that offer, yeah? We can get more if we just don't give up.

loc_skm_19_06.base_text: An offer is on the table, but it's hardly even enough to bribe our dear Mayor! Press them for more, friends.
loc_skm_19_06.loc_text: An offer is on the table, but it's hardly even enough to bribe our dear Mayor! Press them for more, friends.

loc_skm_19_07.base_text: Bah, that offer is for chops. We can make them do better fo' sho'. Stay frosty, friends.
loc_skm_19_07.loc_text: Bah, that offer is for chops. We can make them do better fo' sho'. Stay frosty, friends.

loc_skm_19_08.base_text: They must think we're a bunch of chops with an offer like that. I think we should make them give us more.
loc_skm_19_08.loc_text: They must think we're a bunch of chops with an offer like that. I think we should make them give us more.

loc_skm_22_01.base_text: They're going for the hostage. Stop them!
loc_skm_22_01.loc_text: They're going for the hostage. Stop them!

loc_skm_22_02.base_text: Kerels are trying to take back the hostage.
loc_skm_22_02.loc_text: Kerels are trying to take back the hostage.

loc_skm_22_03.base_text: Don't let the coppers take back the hostage.
loc_skm_22_03.loc_text: Don't let the coppers take back the hostage.

loc_skm_22_04.base_text: You have to keep them away from the hostage.
loc_skm_22_04.loc_text: You have to keep them away from the hostage.

loc_skm_22_06.base_text: Keep your eyes on the hostage!
loc_skm_22_06.loc_text: Keep your eyes on the hostage!

loc_skm_23_01.base_text: Blerrie, they took the hostage out from under your noses! We've messed this one up good!
loc_skm_23_01.loc_text: Blerrie, they took the hostage out from under your noses! We've messed this one up good!

loc_skm_23_02.base_text: Ach, that's what you get from dossing about, friends! They just took the hostage and we gotta go back empty-handed!
loc_skm_23_02.loc_text: Ach, that's what you get from dossing about, friends! They just took the hostage and we gotta go back empty-handed!

loc_skm_23_03.base_text: You let them take the hostage, you chops! It's over, we gotta get you out of there.
loc_skm_23_03.loc_text: You let them take the hostage, you chops! It's over, we gotta get you out of there.

loc_skm_25_01.base_text: Ach, you're making me go bossies! We couldn't  afford to lose anyone! Abort and return to the safehouse.
loc_skm_25_01.loc_text: Ach, you're making me go bossies! We couldn't  afford to lose anyone! Abort and return to the safehouse.

loc_skm_25_02.base_text: You're not supposed to get captured, you chops! We gotta give this one up.
loc_skm_25_02.loc_text: You're not supposed to get captured, you chops! We gotta give this one up.

loc_skm_25_03.base_text: That's not how we do it! Never let them take you. This job is over.
loc_skm_25_03.loc_text: That's not how we do it! Never let them take you. This job is over.

loc_skm_26_01.base_text: Ah, that's it friends. A nice little Payday, though I think we could have gotten more!
loc_skm_26_01.loc_text: Ah, that's it friends. A nice little Payday, though I think we could have gotten more!

loc_skm_26_02.base_text: Good job, everyone. That chop gave us an OK bundle of money to take home, but next time maybe we'll do better.
loc_skm_26_02.loc_text: Good job, everyone. That chop gave us an OK bundle of money to take home, but next time maybe we'll do better.

loc_skm_26_03.base_text: OK, that's done. We got a pretty good payment this time but we could probably have held out longer.
loc_skm_26_03.loc_text: OK, that's done. We got a pretty good payment this time but we could probably have held out longer.

loc_skm_28_01.base_text: Nicely done, friends! A job well done. We probably even emptied the Mayor's personal bank account this time!
loc_skm_28_01.loc_text: Nicely done, friends! A job well done. We probably even emptied the Mayor's personal bank account this time!

loc_skm_28_03.base_text: A bit hairy in the end but you got there. I don't think we could have gotten another penny from those chops. Nice work!
loc_skm_28_03.loc_text: A bit hairy in the end but you got there. I don't think we could have gotten another penny from those chops. Nice work!

loc_skm_brf_01.base_text: Kerels are going to go bossies when they see what we are after, and will be coming after us in droves, so keep your eyes peeled and take them down fast. The longer you can keep them at bay, the more desperate they'll get and give us a bigger load of cash, yeah?
loc_skm_brf_01.loc_text: Kerels are going to go bossies when they see what we are after, and will be coming after us in droves, so keep your eyes peeled and take them down fast. The longer you can keep them at bay, the more desperate they'll get and give us a bigger load of cash, yeah?

loc_skm_end_win.base_text: Good job friends, that was some quick and easy money for us. Going to buy a lot of nice things we can use to pull off more jobs in the future, yeah?
loc_skm_end_win.loc_text: Good job friends, that was some quick and easy money for us. Going to buy a lot of nice things we can use to pull off more jobs in the future, yeah?

loc_skm_intro_01.base_text: Get ready friends, we're almost at the target site.
loc_skm_intro_01.loc_text: Get ready friends, we're almost at the target site.

loc_skm_intro_02.base_text: You're almost there, everyone get your guns ready.
loc_skm_intro_02.loc_text: You're almost there, everyone get your guns ready.

nmh_intro_06_01.base_text: Did you press the right floor? Press the right floor!
nmh_intro_06_01.loc_text: Did you press the right floor? Press the right floor!

nmh_intro_08_01.base_text: We're doin' this shit for a fucking book?
nmh_intro_08_01.loc_text: We're doin' this shit for a fucking book?

pln_al1_cbf_01_01.base_text: Gensec have a brand new vault - the Investment Safe. Unbreakable, they say, and they're showcasing it at the arena. The door is made of their new compound - Vivinite. But everything has a soft spot. With a bit of C4 and a new circular cutter, we can steal their cash out right from beneath them.
pln_al1_cbf_01_01.loc_text: Gensec have a brand new vault - the Investment Safe. Unbreakable, they say, and they're showcasing it at the arena. The door is made of their new compound - Vivinite. But everything has a soft spot. With a bit of C4 and a new circular cutter, we can steal their cash out right from beneath them.

pln_at1_brf_03_01.base_text: We're using a magnetic crane to drop a little present in the path of the Gensec convoy - a steel container of professional badasses. Hit the trucks, and get the loot to the getaway. These docks have a rich history of heistery, gentlemen - do it proud.
pln_at1_brf_03_01.loc_text: We're using a magnetic crane to drop a little present in the path of the Gensec convoy - a steel container of professional badasses. Hit the trucks, and get the loot to the getaway. These docks have a rich history of heistery, gentlemen - do it proud.

pln_at1_cbf_01_01.base_text: I'm sure you guys have tangled with Gensec before. They're the East Coast's premier provider of security solutions, if you believe their brochure. But, PR aside, these guys are serious. Today, we hit them.
pln_at1_cbf_01_01.loc_text: I'm sure you guys have tangled with Gensec before. They're the East Coast's premier provider of security solutions, if you believe their brochure. But, PR aside, these guys are serious. Today, we hit them.

pln_at1_cbf_01_02.base_text: Gensec are a big security company on the East Coast. Got a great reputation with the banks and politicians, but today we're going to see what we can do about that. Got a tip-off about a convoy coming into the city. We're going after it.
pln_at1_cbf_01_02.loc_text: Gensec are a big security company on the East Coast. Got a great reputation with the banks and politicians, but today we're going to see what we can do about that. Got a tip-off about a convoy coming into the city. We're going after it.

pln_at1_cbf_01_03.base_text: Gensec's overland armored convoys employ a lot of ex-military types, providing firepower and muscle, and they move everything from little Jimmy's favorite baseball card to the Crown Jewels. We got a line on a convoy moving into D.C. Let's see what we can get.
pln_at1_cbf_01_03.loc_text: Gensec's overland armored convoys employ a lot of ex-military types, providing firepower and muscle, and they move everything from little Jimmy's favorite baseball card to the Crown Jewels. We got a line on a convoy moving into D.C. Let's see what we can get.

pln_bigoil_stage1_brief_01.base_text: The Elephant gave us the locations of the biker gang hunting for the scientist's little device. I think they're close to finding him - we need their intel so we can get to him first.
pln_bigoil_stage1_brief_01.loc_text: The Elephant gave us the locations of the biker gang hunting for the scientist's little device. I think they're close to finding him - we need their intel so we can get to him first.

pln_bigoil_stage1_brief_02.base_text: Yeah, they're ready for us judging by the number of lookouts... Looks like they have cameras too. Make sure you get close before you hit 'em.
pln_bigoil_stage1_brief_02.loc_text: Yeah, they're ready for us judging by the number of lookouts... Looks like they have cameras too. Make sure you get close before you hit 'em.

pln_bigoil_stage1_intro_a_01.base_text: I don't know how the bikers know we're coming but they do. Maybe all that meth they're doing gives them a sixth sense...
pln_bigoil_stage1_intro_a_01.loc_text: I don't know how the bikers know we're coming but they do. Maybe all that meth they're doing gives them a sixth sense...

pln_bigoil_stage1_intro_a_02.base_text: Looks like they expect a fight. I know you will give em one. Find the safe and the address... get as much intel from these scumbags as you can. Let's roll.
pln_bigoil_stage1_intro_a_02.loc_text: Looks like they expect a fight. I know you will give em one. Find the safe and the address... get as much intel from these scumbags as you can. Let's roll.

pln_bigoil_stage1_intro_a_03.base_text: Ride or die - that was their motto. Well done. This intel will help us greatly. Study it closely before we hit the scientists house. Let's go get this fusion engine.
pln_bigoil_stage1_intro_a_03.loc_text: Ride or die - that was their motto. Well done. This intel will help us greatly. Study it closely before we hit the scientists house. Let's go get this fusion engine.

pln_bo1_01_any_01.base_text: Alright, get to the house and find the address, be careful.
pln_bo1_01_any_01.loc_text: Alright, get to the house and find the address, be careful.

pln_bo1_01_any_02.base_text: OK, that's the clubhouse. Bikers' got the address we need. Sneak in.
pln_bo1_01_any_02.loc_text: OK, that's the clubhouse. Bikers' got the address we need. Sneak in.

pln_bo1_01_any_03.base_text: Quietly now. Sneak up and hit them hard.
pln_bo1_01_any_03.loc_text: Quietly now. Sneak up and hit them hard.

pln_bo1_02_any_01.base_text: OK guys, search the place. They have a safe somewhere, it's probably in there.
pln_bo1_02_any_01.loc_text: OK guys, search the place. They have a safe somewhere, it's probably in there.

pln_bo1_02_any_02.base_text: OK, no time to lose, get all that intel.
pln_bo1_02_any_02.loc_text: OK, no time to lose, get all that intel.

pln_bo1_02_any_03.base_text: Don't let them destroy any intel. Get it all!
pln_bo1_02_any_03.loc_text: Don't let them destroy any intel. Get it all!

pln_bo1_03_any_03.base_text: Check the safe - find it. Fast!
pln_bo1_03_any_03.loc_text: Check the safe - find it. Fast!

pln_bo1_05_any_01.base_text: Yep, that's the inventors address. Beautiful.
pln_bo1_05_any_01.loc_text: Yep, that's the inventors address. Beautiful.

pln_bo1_11_any_03.base_text: OK, this is a fight - they will destroy the intel!
pln_bo1_11_any_03.loc_text: OK, this is a fight - they will destroy the intel!

pln_bo1_15_any_01.base_text: They've mined the place! Watch your step!
pln_bo1_15_any_01.loc_text: They've mined the place! Watch your step!

pln_bo1_15_any_02.base_text: Fuck! That's landmines. Keep off the grass and stay out of the camera view.
pln_bo1_15_any_02.loc_text: Fuck! That's landmines. Keep off the grass and stay out of the camera view.

pln_bo1_15_any_03.base_text: Cameras will set of the mines, guys! Stay away!
pln_bo1_15_any_03.loc_text: Cameras will set of the mines, guys! Stay away!

pln_branchbank_cash_brf_speak_03.base_text: Today's our lucky day - cash delivery from the airport to this bank, all sorts of denominations... So I propose we do a little money exchange of our own.
pln_branchbank_cash_brf_speak_03.loc_text: Today's our lucky day - cash delivery from the airport to this bank, all sorts of denominations... So I propose we do a little money exchange of our own.

pln_branchbank_cash_brf_speak_04.base_text: A little cash goes a long way. The local Harvest & Trustee branch bank needs to be lightened of its load.  Let's do this bank hit, get their vault open, and fill our pockets a little.
pln_branchbank_cash_brf_speak_04.loc_text: A little cash goes a long way. The local Harvest & Trustee branch bank needs to be lightened of its load.  Let's do this bank hit, get their vault open, and fill our pockets a little.

pln_branchbank_gold_brf_speak_01.base_text: You can't go wrong with gold. The Harvest & Trustee bank is trying to up its liquidity with a large deposit. It's something we should take advantage of, don't you think?
pln_branchbank_gold_brf_speak_01.loc_text: You can't go wrong with gold. The Harvest & Trustee bank is trying to up its liquidity with a large deposit. It's something we should take advantage of, don't you think?

pln_branchbank_gold_brf_speak_02.base_text: The Harvest & Trustee bank just got a big gold shipment from South Africa. I think we should make it go away. I can't see they'll miss them much.
pln_branchbank_gold_brf_speak_02.loc_text: The Harvest & Trustee bank just got a big gold shipment from South Africa. I think we should make it go away. I can't see they'll miss them much.

pln_branchbank_gold_brf_speak_03.base_text: In unstable times like these, gold's all you can really depend on.  So who wants to go stabilize our economic future? The Harvest & Trustee bank vault awaits.
pln_branchbank_gold_brf_speak_03.loc_text: In unstable times like these, gold's all you can really depend on.  So who wants to go stabilize our economic future? The Harvest & Trustee bank vault awaits.

pln_branchbank_random_brf_speak_04.base_text: OK people, my guy says this is a good time to hit the bank. Turns out the Harvest & Trustee bank manager should have kept his mouth shut. Anything could be in here.
pln_branchbank_random_brf_speak_04.loc_text: OK people, my guy says this is a good time to hit the bank. Turns out the Harvest & Trustee bank manager should have kept his mouth shut. Anything could be in here.

pln_branchbank_random_stage1_brief_02.base_text: The Harvest & Trustee is a vulnerable bank so I see an opportunity for us. Case it so you can find out where. You're going to need to get into the vault using a thermal drill, get whatever's in there bagged up and moved back to the escape car. Use your judgment and don't be greedy... Good luck, folks.
pln_branchbank_random_stage1_brief_02.loc_text: The Harvest & Trustee is a vulnerable bank so I see an opportunity for us. Case it so you can find out where. You're going to need to get into the vault using a thermal drill, get whatever's in there bagged up and moved back to the escape car. Use your judgment and don't be greedy... Good luck, folks.

pln_branchbank_random_stage1_brief_02b.base_text: You're going to need to get into the vault using a thermal drill, get whatever's in there bagged up and moved back to the escape car. Use your judgment and don't be greedy... Good luck, folks.
pln_branchbank_random_stage1_brief_02b.loc_text: You're going to need to get into the vault using a thermal drill, get whatever's in there bagged up and moved back to the escape car. Use your judgment and don't be greedy... Good luck, folks.

pln_branchbank_random_stage1_intro_a_01.base_text: OK, this is the bank. I advise casing the place, then grab the thermal drill from the back parking lot somewhere. Hit the vault however you want. There's usually a security room so be cautious.
pln_branchbank_random_stage1_intro_a_01.loc_text: OK, this is the bank. I advise casing the place, then grab the thermal drill from the back parking lot somewhere. Hit the vault however you want. There's usually a security room so be cautious.

pln_branchbank_random_stage1_intro_a_03.base_text: Everyone, you know how it's done. My guy dropped the thermal drill in the parking lot, so grab that before you make your move inside. Some surveillance would be smart.
pln_branchbank_random_stage1_intro_a_03.loc_text: Everyone, you know how it's done. My guy dropped the thermal drill in the parking lot, so grab that before you make your move inside. Some surveillance would be smart.

pln_branchbank_stage1_02_any_01.base_text: OK, the vault's got the gold.
pln_branchbank_stage1_02_any_01.loc_text: OK, the vault's got the gold.

pln_branchbank_stage1_11_any_01.base_text: OK, we can leave now, but try and take it all if you can.
pln_branchbank_stage1_11_any_01.loc_text: OK, we can leave now, but try and take it all if you can.

pln_branchbank_stage1_13_any_01.base_text: Alright, bring it to the van, it's right across the street.
pln_branchbank_stage1_13_any_01.loc_text: Alright, bring it to the van, it's right across the street.

pln_branchbank_stage1_21_any_01.base_text: Don't forget about those safe deposit boxes folks, can be good stuff in there.
pln_branchbank_stage1_21_any_01.loc_text: Don't forget about those safe deposit boxes folks, can be good stuff in there.

pln_branchbank_stage1_35_any_01.base_text: Now it's just a matter of time.
pln_branchbank_stage1_35_any_01.loc_text: Now it's just a matter of time.

pln_branchbank_stage1_35_any_03.base_text: Dammit. Now we go the painful way.
pln_branchbank_stage1_35_any_03.loc_text: Dammit. Now we go the painful way.

pln_branchbank_stage1_40_any_01.base_text: It's open! Let's see what we got!
pln_branchbank_stage1_40_any_01.loc_text: It's open! Let's see what we got!

pln_branchbank_stage1_80_any_01.base_text: OK people, there's the bank, I don't know what's in there but it's gonna be good...
pln_branchbank_stage1_80_any_01.loc_text: OK people, there's the bank, I don't know what's in there but it's gonna be good...

pln_branchbank_stage1_81_any_01.base_text: Nice, seems the surprise loot was cash. Bag it.
pln_branchbank_stage1_81_any_01.loc_text: Nice, seems the surprise loot was cash. Bag it.

pln_branchbank_stage1_84_any_01.base_text: OK, great. Now get that thing to the vault door.
pln_branchbank_stage1_84_any_01.loc_text: OK, great. Now get that thing to the vault door.

pln_branchbank_stage1_86_any_01.base_text: Here we go. We should be through in a couple of minutes.
pln_branchbank_stage1_86_any_01.loc_text: Here we go. We should be through in a couple of minutes.

pln_branchbank_stage1_89_any_01.base_text: Good thinking, boards will slow them down.
pln_branchbank_stage1_89_any_01.loc_text: Good thinking, boards will slow them down.

pln_branchbank_stage1_end_a_12.base_text: If there were more crews like you I think the world would need to store its valuables elsewhere.
pln_branchbank_stage1_end_a_12.loc_text: If there were more crews like you I think the world would need to store its valuables elsewhere.

pln_cs1_01_03.base_text: You can try finding vault keycards, two of them, if you want to sneak this place. Maybe in the trunks. Or go loud - it's your choice.
pln_cs1_01_03.loc_text: You can try finding vault keycards, two of them, if you want to sneak this place. Maybe in the trunks. Or go loud - it's your choice.

pln_cs1_02_02.base_text: You got one of the keycards, now find the other one.
pln_cs1_02_02.loc_text: You got one of the keycards, now find the other one.

pln_cs1_03_03.base_text: Great, two keycards. That's what we need. Get to work and open that vault.
pln_cs1_03_03.loc_text: Great, two keycards. That's what we need. Get to work and open that vault.

pln_cs1_04_02.base_text: There we go - green lights. Let the time lock do it's thing. I'd love to see the managers face when those doors swing wide open.
pln_cs1_04_02.loc_text: There we go - green lights. Let the time lock do it's thing. I'd love to see the managers face when those doors swing wide open.

pln_cs1_05_01.base_text: There it goes. The vault is open. It's all yours, gang.
pln_cs1_05_01.loc_text: There it goes. The vault is open. It's all yours, gang.

pln_cs1_06_02.base_text: Piles of green! Thats why we're in this business, gang.
pln_cs1_06_02.loc_text: Piles of green! Thats why we're in this business, gang.

pln_cs1_121_01.base_text: You're through to Mortimer at Roberts Bank. I'd be happy to assist.
pln_cs1_121_01.loc_text: You're through to Mortimer at Roberts Bank. I'd be happy to assist.

pln_cs1_123_01.base_text: This is Roberts Bank. How may I help you today?
pln_cs1_123_01.loc_text: This is Roberts Bank. How may I help you today?

pln_cs1_126_01.base_text: Roberts Bank. Everything's under control. How can I help you?
pln_cs1_126_01.loc_text: Roberts Bank. Everything's under control. How can I help you?

pln_cs1_43_02.base_text: I'm putting you through to our CEO. Please hold.
pln_cs1_43_02.loc_text: I'm putting you through to our CEO. Please hold.

pln_cs1_44_01.base_text: Uh, Barney's not available right now. Can I take a message?
pln_cs1_44_01.loc_text: Uh, Barney's not available right now. Can I take a message?

pln_cs1_46_01.base_text: Right. He got called in to a meeting with a big account. He's doing a great job.
pln_cs1_46_01.loc_text: Right. He got called in to a meeting with a big account. He's doing a great job.

pln_cs1_56_01.base_text: Alright, one more minute til the time lock opens the vault.
pln_cs1_56_01.loc_text: Alright, one more minute til the time lock opens the vault.

pln_cs1_57_01.base_text: Almost there, gang. Any second now.
pln_cs1_57_01.loc_text: Almost there, gang. Any second now.

pln_cs1_58_01.base_text: And there goes the escape driver. Keep going. I'll figure something out.
pln_cs1_58_01.loc_text: And there goes the escape driver. Keep going. I'll figure something out.

pln_cs1_60_01.base_text: One of you guys answer the phone and patch me through.
pln_cs1_60_01.loc_text: One of you guys answer the phone and patch me through.

pln_cs1_66_01.base_text: Crap. That's Gensec. Get ready to deal with them.
pln_cs1_66_01.loc_text: Crap. That's Gensec. Get ready to deal with them.

pln_cs1_82_01.base_text: Remember where that ladder is, gang. You can access the roof there.
pln_cs1_82_01.loc_text: Remember where that ladder is, gang. You can access the roof there.

pln_cs1_brf_01.base_text: We got a bank here. Not a big branch but I've learned the vault is temporarily holding stacks of cash in transit. Foreign exchange notes. Anyway, you know how to do it - your way. Sneak in silent, or unleash hell. Either way, I got a little idea for how to lift the money out of there. You'll see what I mean. I think you'll like it.
pln_cs1_brf_01.loc_text: We got a bank here. Not a big branch but I've learned the vault is temporarily holding stacks of cash in transit. Foreign exchange notes. Anyway, you know how to do it - your way. Sneak in silent, or unleash hell. Either way, I got a little idea for how to lift the money out of there. You'll see what I mean. I think you'll like it.

pln_cs1_cbf_01_01.base_text: Got a line on a recent drop of hard currency. It's tucked away in the vault of a branch of Roberts bank. It's a quiet area. Nothing happens here, so they won't be expecting a hit. Let's punish that complacency.
pln_cs1_cbf_01_01.loc_text: Got a line on a recent drop of hard currency. It's tucked away in the vault of a branch of Roberts bank. It's a quiet area. Nothing happens here, so they won't be expecting a hit. Let's punish that complacency.

pln_cs1_cbf_01_02.base_text: This is Roberts bank. It's a small DC company, almost as old as the city itself. And while I have a lot of respect for the fine institutions of this nation, I have greater respect for what they hold in their vault. My intel says this branch has the lowest hit-rate in the country. Time to change that.
pln_cs1_cbf_01_02.loc_text: This is Roberts bank. It's a small DC company, almost as old as the city itself. And while I have a lot of respect for the fine institutions of this nation, I have greater respect for what they hold in their vault. My intel says this branch has the lowest hit-rate in the country. Time to change that.

pln_ed1_01_01.base_text: OK, make your way inside. Keep it quiet.
pln_ed1_01_01.loc_text: OK, make your way inside. Keep it quiet.

pln_ed1_01_02.base_text: An old fashioned break in. Stay out of sight.
pln_ed1_01_02.loc_text: An old fashioned break in. Stay out of sight.

pln_ed1_01_03.base_text: Get into docks. There'll be security, so stay hidden and stay quiet.
pln_ed1_01_03.loc_text: Get into docks. There'll be security, so stay hidden and stay quiet.

pln_ed1_02_01.base_text: Alright. You're in. Now hunt around. There's gotta be a clue about which truck is carrying the voting machines to Washington. Search containers, check computers - anything you can to figure out the right truck.
pln_ed1_02_01.loc_text: Alright. You're in. Now hunt around. There's gotta be a clue about which truck is carrying the voting machines to Washington. Search containers, check computers - anything you can to figure out the right truck.

pln_ed1_02_02.base_text: Great. Now search the docks. You're looking for something that tells you which truck has the voting machines and is headed for Washington. Search containers, computers - anything. When you've figured it out, tag the right truck.
pln_ed1_02_02.loc_text: Great. Now search the docks. You're looking for something that tells you which truck has the voting machines and is headed for Washington. Search containers, computers - anything. When you've figured it out, tag the right truck.

pln_ed1_02_03.base_text: OK, now look around. We need to tag the truck headed for Washington. Look around for clues. Containers, terminals, any records. Find the right one, and tag it.
pln_ed1_02_03.loc_text: OK, now look around. We need to tag the truck headed for Washington. Look around for clues. Containers, terminals, any records. Find the right one, and tag it.

pln_ed1_03_01.base_text: Tracker placed. Signal coming through. Now haul ass, and let's hope we're chasing Elephant's machines.
pln_ed1_03_01.loc_text: Tracker placed. Signal coming through. Now haul ass, and let's hope we're chasing Elephant's machines.

pln_ed1_03_02.base_text: Getting a nice clear signal. Time to leave, guys. I hope you tagged the right truck.
pln_ed1_03_02.loc_text: Getting a nice clear signal. Time to leave, guys. I hope you tagged the right truck.

pln_ed1_03_03.base_text: GPS is online. Providing you tagged the right truck, this is great work. Time to go.
pln_ed1_03_03.loc_text: GPS is online. Providing you tagged the right truck, this is great work. Time to go.

pln_ed1_04_01.base_text: They've seen you! The trucks are moving out. Alright, we need a Plan B. Lemme think.
pln_ed1_04_01.loc_text: They've seen you! The trucks are moving out. Alright, we need a Plan B. Lemme think.

pln_ed1_04_02.base_text: Crap! You were seen, and the convoy is rolling out. We need another way to find our truck.
pln_ed1_04_02.loc_text: Crap! You were seen, and the convoy is rolling out. We need another way to find our truck.

pln_ed1_04_03.base_text: The trucks are on the move. Someone saw you! OK, time for another plan.
pln_ed1_04_03.loc_text: The trucks are on the move. Someone saw you! OK, time for another plan.

pln_ed1_09_01.base_text: That terminal is showing which truck is going where. Keep checking. It might help pinpoint our truck.
pln_ed1_09_01.loc_text: That terminal is showing which truck is going where. Keep checking. It might help pinpoint our truck.

pln_ed1_09_02.base_text: That computer is showing which truck is going where. Could be valuable to know that.
pln_ed1_09_02.loc_text: That computer is showing which truck is going where. Could be valuable to know that.

pln_ed1_09_03.base_text: The PC is showing where the trucks are headed. Keep an eye out for those bound for Washington.
pln_ed1_09_03.loc_text: The PC is showing where the trucks are headed. Keep an eye out for those bound for Washington.

pln_ed1_14_01.base_text: There have to be clues around the wharf that'll help you figure out which truck is carrying the machines to Washington. Keep your eyes peeled.
pln_ed1_14_01.loc_text: There have to be clues around the wharf that'll help you figure out which truck is carrying the machines to Washington. Keep your eyes peeled.

pln_ed1_14_02.base_text: Look around. There should be clues that will point you to the right truck. Perhaps matching their color to the containers.
pln_ed1_14_02.loc_text: Look around. There should be clues that will point you to the right truck. Perhaps matching their color to the containers.

pln_ed1_14_03.base_text: There should be clues around to help you figure out the truck. Get Sherlocking. Look for open containers, they might indicate what the trucks are carrying.
pln_ed1_14_03.loc_text: There should be clues around to help you figure out the truck. Get Sherlocking. Look for open containers, they might indicate what the trucks are carrying.

pln_ed1_15_01.base_text: Look inside the containers. Find what cargo they're carrying. Maybe that could help you figure out which is the right truck.
pln_ed1_15_01.loc_text: Look inside the containers. Find what cargo they're carrying. Maybe that could help you figure out which is the right truck.

pln_ed1_15_02.base_text: Maybe the contents of those shipping containers can help you figure out which is our truck.
pln_ed1_15_02.loc_text: Maybe the contents of those shipping containers can help you figure out which is our truck.

pln_ed1_15_03.base_text: Those containers have cargo. That might help you eliminate the wrong trucks.
pln_ed1_15_03.loc_text: Those containers have cargo. That might help you eliminate the wrong trucks.

pln_ed1_16_01.base_text: One of these trucks is the one we want. When you've finished searching for clues, get the tag on the truck you think is our target. You get one chance, so make sure you're certain.
pln_ed1_16_01.loc_text: One of these trucks is the one we want. When you've finished searching for clues, get the tag on the truck you think is our target. You get one chance, so make sure you're certain.

pln_ed1_16_02.base_text: One of these is the truck carrying the voting machines to Washington. When you think you know which one it is, get the tracker on it and we can move on.
pln_ed1_16_02.loc_text: One of these is the truck carrying the voting machines to Washington. When you think you know which one it is, get the tracker on it and we can move on.

pln_ed1_16_03.base_text: These are the trucks. When you're done searching for clues, get the that GPS on the truck you think is carrying the voting machines to Washington.
pln_ed1_16_03.loc_text: These are the trucks. When you're done searching for clues, get the that GPS on the truck you think is carrying the voting machines to Washington.

pln_ed1_brf_02.base_text: The Elephant's PR will claim he came to power through depth, leadership and integrity, but that's bullshit. That oily bastard's going to cheat his way to the Senate, and this is where you come in. There are trucks at Pier 39. One of them has voting machines. Find the truck and attach a GPS-tracker to it. We'll deal with it down the line. Naturally, The Elephant wants this done with as little chance of bad press coming back to him as possible. So he's ear-marked some of his considerable campaign funds for a special black-ops bonus. You guys do this quietly, and the good politician will see you well rewarded.
pln_ed1_brf_02.loc_text: The Elephant's PR will claim he came to power through depth, leadership and integrity, but that's bullshit. That oily bastard's going to cheat his way to the Senate, and this is where you come in. There are trucks at Pier 39. One of them has voting machines. Find the truck and attach a GPS-tracker to it. We'll deal with it down the line. Naturally, The Elephant wants this done with as little chance of bad press coming back to him as possible. So he's ear-marked some of his considerable campaign funds for a special black-ops bonus. You guys do this quietly, and the good politician will see you well rewarded.

pln_ed1_end_a_01.base_text: That was an excellent piece of whisper-work. They didn't know you were there. Now let's see where that truck leads us.
pln_ed1_end_a_01.loc_text: That was an excellent piece of whisper-work. They didn't know you were there. Now let's see where that truck leads us.

pln_ed1_end_a_02.base_text: It takes special skills to ninja through a secure warehouse in broad daylight. Great work. Now, let's see if it was worth it.
pln_ed1_end_a_02.loc_text: It takes special skills to ninja through a secure warehouse in broad daylight. Great work. Now, let's see if it was worth it.

pln_ed1_intro_a_01.base_text: Pier 39. Tag the truck carrying the voting machines to Washington, and get back here. Let me stress, we're only here for the truck.
pln_ed1_intro_a_01.loc_text: Pier 39. Tag the truck carrying the voting machines to Washington, and get back here. Let me stress, we're only here for the truck.

pln_ed1_intro_a_02.base_text: Pier 39. Find the truck that has the voting machines. It will be bound for Washington. Figure out which one it is, slap on the tracker and get the hell out. Keep it quiet.
pln_ed1_intro_a_02.loc_text: Pier 39. Find the truck that has the voting machines. It will be bound for Washington. Figure out which one it is, slap on the tracker and get the hell out. Keep it quiet.

pln_ed2_01_01.base_text: Your first job is getting into the depot. Scout the area, check for cameras and guards. Keep it quiet.
pln_ed2_01_01.loc_text: Your first job is getting into the depot. Scout the area, check for cameras and guards. Keep it quiet.

pln_ed2_01_02.base_text: First, you need to break into the depot. Try and keep it quiet. If you can't keep it quiet, make it fast.
pln_ed2_01_02.loc_text: First, you need to break into the depot. Try and keep it quiet. If you can't keep it quiet, make it fast.

pln_ed2_01_03.base_text: First, you gotta break into the warehouse. It'd be great if you can keep the noise down.
pln_ed2_01_03.loc_text: First, you gotta break into the warehouse. It'd be great if you can keep the noise down.

pln_ed2_02_03.base_text: Your next target is the voting machines. I'll bet they're stored in sealed crates. You clowns will need to improvise to open them.
pln_ed2_02_03.loc_text: Your next target is the voting machines. I'll bet they're stored in sealed crates. You clowns will need to improvise to open them.

pln_ed2_03_03.base_text: Once you have something to break them open, get searching the crates.
pln_ed2_03_03.loc_text: Once you have something to break them open, get searching the crates.

pln_ed2_04_01.base_text: Those shipping crates are sealed tighter than a gnat's asshole. You need to find something to break them open.
pln_ed2_04_01.loc_text: Those shipping crates are sealed tighter than a gnat's asshole. You need to find something to break them open.

pln_ed2_04_02.base_text: Look for something to crack those crates open.
pln_ed2_04_02.loc_text: Look for something to crack those crates open.

pln_ed2_05_01.base_text: Great! That's one of our voting machines! Hack it when there's no one nearby. If they see what you're up to, things will get loud.
pln_ed2_05_01.loc_text: Great! That's one of our voting machines! Hack it when there's no one nearby. If they see what you're up to, things will get loud.

pln_ed2_05_02.base_text: That certainly looks like one of the voting machines. When you're ready to kill democracy, start the hack. Make sure no-one sees you.
pln_ed2_05_02.loc_text: That certainly looks like one of the voting machines. When you're ready to kill democracy, start the hack. Make sure no-one sees you.

pln_ed2_05_03.base_text: That's one of the voting machines. Great job! Alright, when the coast is clear, get the hack started.
pln_ed2_05_03.loc_text: That's one of the voting machines. Great job! Alright, when the coast is clear, get the hack started.

pln_ed2_07_01.base_text: That's the first machine hacked. Make sure you close up that crate. Don't want anyone getting suspicious.
pln_ed2_07_01.loc_text: That's the first machine hacked. Make sure you close up that crate. Don't want anyone getting suspicious.

pln_ed2_07_02.base_text: Great, that one's hacked. Get that crate closed, then find another.
pln_ed2_07_02.loc_text: Great, that one's hacked. Get that crate closed, then find another.

pln_ed2_07_03.base_text: The machine's done. That should make The Elephant happy. Now close up the crate and keep going.
pln_ed2_07_03.loc_text: The machine's done. That should make The Elephant happy. Now close up the crate and keep going.

pln_ed2_09_01.base_text: You've been made! Damn, this is gonna get messy. Just keep hacking, I'll think of something.
pln_ed2_09_01.loc_text: You've been made! Damn, this is gonna get messy. Just keep hacking, I'll think of something.

pln_ed2_09_03.base_text: That's the alarm. MPD response channels just went crazy. OK, no matter. Keep hacking those machines.
pln_ed2_09_03.loc_text: That's the alarm. MPD response channels just went crazy. OK, no matter. Keep hacking those machines.

pln_ed2_12_02.base_text: Alright. I need you to do one more errand before you bug out. Get to the security room and grab the footage from the cameras. Just in case they got anything incriminating.
pln_ed2_12_02.loc_text: Alright. I need you to do one more errand before you bug out. Get to the security room and grab the footage from the cameras. Just in case they got anything incriminating.

pln_ed2_15_03.base_text: That's the last one. Tip toe back to the van, and we can consider this a job well done.
pln_ed2_15_03.loc_text: That's the last one. Tip toe back to the van, and we can consider this a job well done.

pln_ed2_19_01.base_text: Just got a message from The Elephant. Your bonus for keeping things clandestine has been dropped off. It's near the escape van.
pln_ed2_19_01.loc_text: Just got a message from The Elephant. Your bonus for keeping things clandestine has been dropped off. It's near the escape van.

pln_ed2_brf_01.base_text: I've traced the truck to a warehouse out by Goose Island. It's a distribution depot, contracted to ship the voting machines to their final destination. With a little technical wizardry, we're going to make those machines a bit more sympathetic to The Elephant's mayoral candidate - that slimy ballbag McKendrick. Get in there, get them hacked, get out - simple. Once again, The Elephant is extending his stealth bonus if you can keep it quiet.
pln_ed2_brf_01.loc_text: I've traced the truck to a warehouse out by Goose Island. It's a distribution depot, contracted to ship the voting machines to their final destination. With a little technical wizardry, we're going to make those machines a bit more sympathetic to The Elephant's mayoral candidate - that slimy ballbag McKendrick. Get in there, get them hacked, get out - simple. Once again, The Elephant is extending his stealth bonus if you can keep it quiet.

pln_ed2_end_a_01.base_text: That was a superb display of stealth. You guys are made of shadows. The machines are hacked, the votes are flooding in and it is a landslide for The Elephant's man. God bless democracy!
pln_ed2_end_a_01.loc_text: That was a superb display of stealth. You guys are made of shadows. The machines are hacked, the votes are flooding in and it is a landslide for The Elephant's man. God bless democracy!

pln_ed2_end_a_02.base_text: Outstanding work. Tonight, you clowns made yourself a friend in high places. You'll never pay another parking ticket in this town.
pln_ed2_end_a_02.loc_text: Outstanding work. Tonight, you clowns made yourself a friend in high places. You'll never pay another parking ticket in this town.

pln_ed2_end_b_01.base_text: Things got messy, but you got through in the end. The hacks worked. It looks like the good lady Mayor's people was behind this. The press are already sharpening the knives for Schwartz. Needless to say, The Elephant is ecstatic. You have served your city well tonight, my friends.
pln_ed2_end_b_01.loc_text: Things got messy, but you got through in the end. The hacks worked. It looks like the good lady Mayor's people was behind this. The press are already sharpening the knives for Schwartz. Needless to say, The Elephant is ecstatic. You have served your city well tonight, my friends.

pln_ed2_end_b_02.base_text: Great work! The hacked machines have made it look like the Mayor's people were behind this. Even if an enquiry exonerates her, the papers are hurling so many buckets of shit at the Mayor that she's finished. And The Elephant? Well, his man is picking out new furniture for City Hall. Great work, gang!
pln_ed2_end_b_02.loc_text: Great work! The hacked machines have made it look like the Mayor's people were behind this. Even if an enquiry exonerates her, the papers are hurling so many buckets of shit at the Mayor that she's finished. And The Elephant? Well, his man is picking out new furniture for City Hall. Great work, gang!

pln_ed2_intro_a_01.base_text: Pull over here. There's the warehouse up ahead. Let's do this.
pln_ed2_intro_a_01.loc_text: Pull over here. There's the warehouse up ahead. Let's do this.

pln_ed2_intro_a_02.base_text: That's the depot where the machines are kept. Move out, you clowns.
pln_ed2_intro_a_02.loc_text: That's the depot where the machines are kept. Move out, you clowns.

pln_ed2_intro_a_03.base_text: That's the warehouse where the voting machines are kept. Time for a little political engineering.
pln_ed2_intro_a_03.loc_text: That's the warehouse where the voting machines are kept. Time for a little political engineering.

pln_ed3_20_01.base_text: Those cameras won't be a problem anymore!
pln_ed3_20_01.loc_text: Those cameras won't be a problem anymore!

pln_ed3_20_02.base_text: That'll keep nosy bastards from spying on our business. Good.
pln_ed3_20_02.loc_text: That'll keep nosy bastards from spying on our business. Good.

pln_ed3_20_03.base_text: The surveillance operator is down. Those cameras shouldn't bother you anymore!
pln_ed3_20_03.loc_text: The surveillance operator is down. Those cameras shouldn't bother you anymore!

pln_ed3_brf_b_01.base_text: That truck you assholes tagged wasn't the right one, so we can forget about intercepting those voting machines. We're going to try something else to keep the Elephant sweet. We can trigger a re-election by scrambling the server at the polling place. To avoid suspicion on our sponsor, we'll make it look like collateral damage by robbing the bank next door.
pln_ed3_brf_b_01.loc_text: That truck you assholes tagged wasn't the right one, so we can forget about intercepting those voting machines. We're going to try something else to keep the Elephant sweet. We can trigger a re-election by scrambling the server at the polling place. To avoid suspicion on our sponsor, we'll make it look like collateral damage by robbing the bank next door.

pln_esc_02_to_arrival.base_text: Two minutes until you can get the hell out of there.
pln_esc_02_to_arrival.loc_text: Two minutes until you can get the hell out of there.

pln_esc_fixed_heli.base_text: Guys, I've secured a chopper to get you out. Stay put!
pln_esc_fixed_heli.loc_text: Guys, I've secured a chopper to get you out. Stay put!

pln_esc_pep.base_text: Keep it together! You can't fall apart now!
pln_esc_pep.loc_text: Keep it together! You can't fall apart now!

pln_esc_plan_b.base_text: I'll get you out of there. Just keep the loot safe!
pln_esc_plan_b.loc_text: I'll get you out of there. Just keep the loot safe!

pln_esc_start.base_text: Watch out, guys! The cops are surrounding you!
pln_esc_start.loc_text: Watch out, guys! The cops are surrounding you!

pln_ff3_03_any_01.base_text: OK, OK, we gotta change this up!
pln_ff3_03_any_01.loc_text: OK, OK, we gotta change this up!

pln_ff3_04_any_01.base_text: The arms deal guys... We got to get that deal exposed in the media and fast. It will create a framing effect for sure.
pln_ff3_04_any_01.loc_text: The arms deal guys... We got to get that deal exposed in the media and fast. It will create a framing effect for sure.

pln_ff3_09_any_01.base_text: What a flat! These arms deals sure are a nice addition to his senator pay.
pln_ff3_09_any_01.loc_text: What a flat! These arms deals sure are a nice addition to his senator pay.

pln_ff3_10_any_01.base_text: Man... This place... Find that gold and we can buy one of our own.
pln_ff3_10_any_01.loc_text: Man... This place... Find that gold and we can buy one of our own.

pln_ff3_11_any_01.base_text: OK, be careful! It will be worth sneaking all the way through, boys. No alarms and this framing will be perfect!
pln_ff3_11_any_01.loc_text: OK, be careful! It will be worth sneaking all the way through, boys. No alarms and this framing will be perfect!

pln_ff3_12_any_01.base_text: Look at all these nice things. Must have done a lot of public service in his career.
pln_ff3_12_any_01.loc_text: Look at all these nice things. Must have done a lot of public service in his career.

pln_ff3_13_any_01.base_text: Public office. Wow, we are in the wrong line of work gentlemen.
pln_ff3_13_any_01.loc_text: Public office. Wow, we are in the wrong line of work gentlemen.

pln_ff3_16_any_01.base_text: 1600 Penn, maybe we go there for our next big score.
pln_ff3_16_any_01.loc_text: 1600 Penn, maybe we go there for our next big score.

pln_ff3_18_any_01.base_text: It feels bad to leave the gold, but we will get paid. Maybe we can return.
pln_ff3_18_any_01.loc_text: It feels bad to leave the gold, but we will get paid. Maybe we can return.

pln_fj1_01_01.base_text: Get into the store, watch the civilians, watch the cameras and get it done.
pln_fj1_01_01.loc_text: Get into the store, watch the civilians, watch the cameras and get it done.

pln_fj1_01_02.base_text: Get into the store, you know what to do! Let's get those jewels.
pln_fj1_01_02.loc_text: Get into the store, you know what to do! Let's get those jewels.

pln_fj1_03_01.base_text: That's the stuff. Get it to the van.
pln_fj1_03_01.loc_text: That's the stuff. Get it to the van.

pln_fj1_03_02.base_text: That's what we are after. Get it to the van.
pln_fj1_03_02.loc_text: That's what we are after. Get it to the van.

pln_ko1_13_02.loc_text: Two card reader with a 10 second time lock? You can bet they're holding some serious hardware in that vault.

pln_ko1_13_03.base_text: The vault needs two cards, entered almost simultaneously. You can bet there's something particularly tasty in there.
pln_ko1_13_03.loc_text: The vault needs two cards, entered almost simultaneously. You can bet there's something particularly tasty in there.

pln_ko1_22_02.base_text: Armor of a Shogun. Nabunaga. Thought lost for centuries, but... here it is. Get the pieces bagged.
pln_ko1_22_02.loc_text: Armor of a Shogun. Nabunaga. Thought lost for centuries, but... here it is. Get the pieces bagged.

pln_ko1_23_01.base_text: I can't believe we scored Oda's armor. Outstanding work!
pln_ko1_23_01.loc_text: I can't believe we scored Oda's armor. Outstanding work!

pln_ko1_24_01.base_text: Gage has arranged for one of the dumpsters to be used to stash some loot.
pln_ko1_24_01.loc_text: Gage has arranged for one of the dumpsters to be used to stash some loot.

pln_ko1_24_03.base_text: Gage sorted a dumpster to stash a bit of loot in. His people will collect it in the morning.
pln_ko1_24_03.loc_text: Gage sorted a dumpster to stash a bit of loot in. His people will collect it in the morning.

pln_ko1_end_01_02.base_text: That was text-book whisper mode, guys. Great work.
pln_ko1_end_01_02.loc_text: That was text-book whisper mode, guys. Great work.

pln_ko1_end_01_03.base_text: Ninja's in socks tiptoeing on thick carpet make more noise than you. Expertly done!
pln_ko1_end_01_03.loc_text: Ninja's in socks tiptoeing on thick carpet make more noise than you. Expertly done!

pln_ko1_intro_01_01.base_text: OK, pull over here, and get your masks on.
pln_ko1_intro_01_01.loc_text: OK, pull over here, and get your masks on.

pln_man_01_01.loc_text: Remember we need both the Taxman and the server, people. Scare him and make him go into the limo once we've confirmed that he has the server on him.

pln_man_03_01.loc_text: Look out the window - Taxman is the guy in the white shirt.

pln_man_05_01.base_text: The other party is now a minute away.
pln_man_05_01.loc_text: The other party is now a minute away.

pln_man_12_01.base_text: He's at the trunk. He um....

pln_man_13_02.loc_text: He put something inside his shirt.

pln_man_14_01.loc_text: Yeah.. I ... I don't know .. It could have been a big gun.

pln_man_17_01.base_text: WHAT! Guys get your heads down.
pln_man_17_01.loc_text: WHAT! Guys get your heads down.

pln_man_brf_01.base_text: The Taxman thought he was clever making a deal with a big corporation, but the information leaked, and now bigger sharks want in - all in. We have a complete, run-down building to ourselves, overlooking the deal. We've got a set-up installed. Alex will help with the crane. Scare the Taxman into his limo, shake him up, and he'll be sure to give us the server and the codes. When it's about $25,000,000, anything goes.

Scare the Taxman into his limo, shake him up, and he'll be sure to give us the server and the codes. When it's about $25,000,000, anything goes.

pln_misc_sj_dgh_02_01.base_text: You killed one of them? Damn, I can't say the prick didn't deserve it, but Wick wanted the pleasure himself.
pln_misc_sj_dgh_02_01.loc_text: You killed one of them? Damn, I can't say the prick didn't deserve it, but Wick wanted the pleasure himself.

pln_misc_sj_dgh_04_02.loc_text: Good job. Leave them there for now while we take care of the bank.

pln_nmh_01_01.base_text: OK, guys. Remember:  computer, blood sample, validation and then get the hell out by the elevator. Oh, and I hope you brought something to take out the security cameras with.
pln_nmh_01_01.loc_text: OK, guys. Remember:  computer, blood sample, validation and then get the hell out by the elevator. Oh, and I hope you brought something to take out the security cameras with.

pln_nmh_02_01.loc_text: You'll have about seven seconds to take out the cameras before the alarm goes off.

pln_nmh_05_01.loc_text: You got nine cameras to take care of.

pln_nmh_108_01.loc_text: It's on fire! The whole damn roof!

pln_nmh_112_01.loc_text: Great, now down the ramp and get outside.

pln_nmh_20_02.loc_text: Now you just gotta make sure no one gets away and alerts the guards in the ICU.

pln_nmh_21_02.loc_text: Hook me into the reception computer so that I can see where the doctors are keeping our target.

pln_nmh_24_01.loc_text: Keep the civilians away from the alarms.

pln_nmh_24_02.loc_text: Don't let any civilians get near the alarms!

pln_nmh_29_03.loc_text: Pick up the phone and let me do the talking.

pln_nmh_32_01.loc_text: Mercy Hospital, please hold... Ok, now how can I help?

pln_nmh_32_02.base_text: Hi! Yes, what can I do for you?
pln_nmh_32_02.loc_text: Hi! Yes, what can I do for you?

pln_nmh_32_04.loc_text: Hello, B-uhm... nurse Bain speaking. What do you need?

pln_nmh_33_02.loc_text: Uhuh... uhuh... OK, sure. We'll have a look.

pln_nmh_33_05.base_text: Yeah, the uh... monitor here just broke. Made a lot of noise. Scared an old lady but the janitor took care of her.

pln_nmh_78_01.loc_text: Damn thing keeps stopping. I gotta override the system. It'll be a while until it reaches you.

pln_nmh_98_01.base_text: They're crazy! Shooting up the building with missiles! What the hell is this?!

pln_nmh_99_01.base_text: Guys!... Guys! You still there?! Get... -out!
pln_nmh_99_01.loc_text: Guys!... Guys! You still there?! Get... -out!

pln_nmh_brf_01.base_text: Our client needs a blood sample from a patient being kept in the isolation ward of Mercy Hostpital. You gotta go in there, take out the surveillance, subdue the civilians and get me into the patient database so I can ID the guy. With the low security in this place, it should be a nice, clean job. I'll get you out via the roof when you're done. This job is a little shady, brokered through a third party- got some serious shadow-company military industrial vibes, but worth the risk. The payday is something we're gonna need in the future, plus a nice cash bonus.

Running a printing operation out of his basement. It's a discreet operation, and this guy's work is solid, so he's making serious bank. Let's grab a piece!

pln_rt1_12_any_01.loc_text: Good,OK, the reaction seems fine, keep going.

pln_rt1_12_any_02.base_text: OK - looks stable, for now. Add more stuff...
pln_rt1_12_any_02.loc_text: OK - looks stable, for now. Add more stuff...

pln_rt1_12_any_03.base_text: Shush! What's that sound... Hmm, seems, nah seems OK.
pln_rt1_12_any_03.loc_text: Shush! What's that sound... Hmm, seems, nah seems OK.

pln_rt1_12_any_05.base_text: Alright on this webpage. What did you just add? Alright. OK, OK.
pln_rt1_12_any_05.loc_text: Alright on this webpage. What did you just add? Alright. OK, OK.

pln_rt1_12_any_11.base_text: OK, keep that smoke to a minimum... Keep going.

pln_rt1_14_any_03.loc_text: Shit, you got crawlers outside. Watch those windows!

pln_rt1_a_09.base_text: Uh, if I read this correctly... uh...
pln_rt1_a_09.loc_text: Uh, if I read this correctly... uh...

pln_rt1_a_10.base_text: Uh, I hope I got this right...
pln_rt1_a_10.loc_text: Uh, I hope I got this right...

pln_rt1_b2_02.base_text: Oh I'm going with muriatic acid.
pln_rt1_b2_02.loc_text: Oh I'm going with muriatic acid.

pln_rt1_c2_06.loc_text: Oh I'm going with caustic soda.

pln_rt1_e_02.base_text: Find some, and pour it in.
pln_rt1_e_02.loc_text: Find some, and pour it in.

pln_rt1_e_03.base_text: You got some of that somewhere?
pln_rt1_e_03.loc_text: You got some of that somewhere?

pln_rt1_e_05.base_text: That should get the process going.
pln_rt1_e_05.loc_text: That should get the process going.

pln_rt1_f_09.base_text: Hold it! You didn't put it in yet, right?
pln_rt1_f_09.loc_text: Hold it! You didn't put it in yet, right?

pln_rt1_h_08.loc_text: By method of elimination it has to be caustic soda.

pln_rt1_i_07.base_text: I messed up. It should'a been hydrogen chloride.
pln_rt1_i_07.loc_text: I messed up. It should'a been hydrogen chloride.

pln_rt1_i_08.loc_text: By method of elimination it has to be hydrogen chloride.

pln_rt1_j_14.base_text: ...what's the worst that could happen, right?
pln_rt1_j_14.loc_text: ...what's the worst that could happen, right?

pln_rt1_j_15.base_text: ...these internet descriptions are iffy at best.
pln_rt1_j_15.loc_text: ...these internet descriptions are iffy at best.

pln_rt1b_01_01.base_text: Damn, looks like the cops had been staking the place. Move it!
pln_rt1b_01_01.loc_text: Damn, looks like the cops had been staking the place. Move it!

pln_rt1b_01_02.base_text: Ah hell. Heat is on the way. Guess the cops were watching the place.
pln_rt1b_01_02.loc_text: Ah hell. Heat is on the way. Guess the cops were watching the place.

pln_rt1b_01_03.base_text: No time to waste. Get in there!
pln_rt1b_01_03.loc_text: No time to waste. Get in there!

pln_rt1b_02_02.base_text: There are only a few ingredients left. You want more, just use a flare to signal the helicopter. He's got what you need for cooking more. Or you can bug out now. Up to you.
pln_rt1b_02_02.loc_text: There are only a few ingredients left. You want more, just use a flare to signal the helicopter. He's got what you need for cooking more. Or you can bug out now. Up to you.

pln_rt1b_02_03.base_text: This place is running low on supplies. If you wanna go for more ingredients, signal the chopper with a flare. This pilot's on the clock, so make it worth while. Or you can bounce. Your call.
pln_rt1b_02_03.loc_text: This place is running low on supplies. If you wanna go for more ingredients, signal the chopper with a flare. This pilot's on the clock, so make it worth while. Or you can bounce. Your call.

pln_rt1b_03_02.base_text: OK, now wait for the pilot.
pln_rt1b_03_02.loc_text: OK, now wait for the pilot.

pln_rt1b_03_03.base_text: That's it. Now wait for the pilot to signal in.
pln_rt1b_03_03.loc_text: That's it. Now wait for the pilot to signal in.

pln_rt1b_04_01.base_text: There's the drop. Snatch it and place it by the lab.
pln_rt1b_04_01.loc_text: There's the drop. Snatch it and place it by the lab.

pln_rt1b_04_03.base_text: Pilot dropped the supplies. Get them into the house.
pln_rt1b_04_03.loc_text: Pilot dropped the supplies. Get them into the house.

pln_rt1b_05_01.base_text: Be careful with the cooking, gentlemen.
pln_rt1b_05_01.loc_text: Be careful with the cooking, gentlemen.

pln_rt1b_05_03.base_text: Great. Let's cook a little more product. Just don't set anything on fire.
pln_rt1b_05_03.loc_text: Great. Let's cook a little more product. Just don't set anything on fire.

pln_rt1b_06_02.base_text: You know what to do. Signal the chopper, and we'll drop off more ingredients. Or bail. Your choice.
pln_rt1b_06_02.loc_text: You know what to do. Signal the chopper, and we'll drop off more ingredients. Or bail. Your choice.

pln_rt1b_07_01.base_text: Grab the raw materials and get them in the house.
pln_rt1b_07_01.loc_text: Grab the raw materials and get them in the house.

pln_rt1b_08_01.base_text: We can't use the lab anymore, it's gone
pln_rt1b_08_01.loc_text: We can't use the lab anymore, it's gone

pln_rt1b_brf_01_01.base_text: This is a simple job, but that doesn't mean it will be easy. We're going to head out to the forest. You remember the place. We did some work for Hector out there. Anyway, I scoped the place out and it is still intact. So, we're headed there to cook up as much meth as we can. You can stay as long as you want. If you run out of supplies, I'll get more flown in. Should be easy money.
pln_rt1b_brf_01_01.loc_text: This is a simple job, but that doesn't mean it will be easy. We're going to head out to the forest. You remember the place. We did some work for Hector out there. Anyway, I scoped the place out and it is still intact. So, we're headed there to cook up as much meth as we can. You can stay as long as you want. If you run out of supplies, I'll get more flown in. Should be easy money.

pln_rt1b_cbf_01_01.base_text: You guys remember that sketchy old house out in the forest? Where Hector's guys were cooking up meth? Well, we're headed back there.
pln_rt1b_cbf_01_01.loc_text: You guys remember that sketchy old house out in the forest? Where Hector's guys were cooking up meth? Well, we're headed back there.

pln_rt1b_end_03_01.base_text: Nice haul! This will bring in a nice chunk of change. Good job!
pln_rt1b_end_03_01.loc_text: Nice haul! This will bring in a nice chunk of change. Good job!

pln_rt1b_intro_01_02.base_text: This is the place. It's hardly changed.
pln_rt1b_intro_01_02.loc_text: This is the place. It's hardly changed.

pln_rt1b_intro_01_03.base_text: It's a dirty job, but easy money.
pln_rt1b_intro_01_03.loc_text: It's a dirty job, but easy money.

pln_rvd_cbf_01.base_text: Guys, we need to talk about what happened up in Alaska, but I've got another job first, while you're still out west. So, the son of an old friend of mine in L.A., member of the Cabot crime family needs help hitting a jewelry store for a haul of diamonds. I owe him big from years ago, when his dad got me out of a jam, so I promised him a little extra muscle as payback. These guys are pro's, real characters. They even use code names! You guys up for it?
pln_rvd_cbf_01.loc_text: Guys, we need to talk about what happened up in Alaska, but I've got another job first, while you're still out west. So, the son of an old friend of mine in L.A., member of the Cabot crime family needs help hitting a jewelry store for a haul of diamonds.
