You guys up for it?

pln_sh11_00_01.base_text: Yeah yeah, just put on your mask now.
pln_sh11_00_01.loc_text: Yeah yeah, just put on your mask now.

pln_sh11_00_03.base_text: You done? Good. Put on your mask now.
pln_sh11_00_03.loc_text: You done? Good. Put on your mask now.

pln_sh11_01_01.base_text: You see that fence? Cut it open and get inside.
pln_sh11_01_01.loc_text: You see that fence? Cut it open and get inside.

pln_sh11_01_02.base_text: There should be a fence nearby. Cut it open and get inside.
pln_sh11_01_02.loc_text: There should be a fence nearby. Cut it open and get inside.

pln_sh11_02_01.base_text: Now keep moving. And as much as you hate this, this is still a real thing. You get discovered you'll trigger the alarm.
pln_sh11_02_01.loc_text: Now keep moving. And as much as you hate this, this is still a real thing. You get discovered you'll trigger the alarm.

pln_sh11_02_02.base_text: Keep moving and don't play around. You trigger the alarm, we're screwed.
pln_sh11_02_02.loc_text: Keep moving and don't play around. You trigger the alarm, we're screwed.

pln_sh11_02_03.base_text: Keep moving and get inside.This might be a game to you, but there are guards all around.
pln_sh11_02_03.loc_text: Keep moving and get inside.This might be a game to you, but there are guards all around.

pln_sh11_03_01.base_text: Your instincts are correct my friend. You'll have to take him out.
pln_sh11_03_01.loc_text: Your instincts are correct my friend. You'll have to take him out.

pln_sh11_04_01.base_text: Quick! Answer his pager and make some crap up.
pln_sh11_04_01.loc_text: Quick! Answer his pager and make some crap up.

pln_sh11_04_02.base_text: Hurry! Answer his pager before they raise the alarm. Try and improvise or something.
pln_sh11_04_02.loc_text: Hurry! Answer his pager before they raise the alarm. Try and improvise or something.

pln_sh11_05_01.base_text: Okay, good. Now, bag that body and get it out of sight before someone comes looking.
pln_sh11_05_01.loc_text: Okay, good. Now, bag that body and get it out of sight before someone comes looking.

pln_sh11_05_02.base_text: Great. Bag that body and get it out of sight before someone sees it.
pln_sh11_05_02.loc_text: Great. Bag that body and get it out of sight before someone sees it.

pln_sh11_06_03.base_text: That dumpster should do the trick.
pln_sh11_06_03.loc_text: That dumpster should do the trick.

pln_sh11_08_01.base_text: There's another guard. Stay out of sight.
pln_sh11_08_01.loc_text: There's another guard. Stay out of sight.

pln_sh11_08_02.base_text: Another guard up ahead. Stay in the shadows.
pln_sh11_08_02.loc_text: Another guard up ahead. Stay in the shadows.

pln_sh11_09_01.base_text: Eh, screw it. It doesn't look like you'll be able to pass him undetected. Take him out.
pln_sh11_09_01.loc_text: Eh, screw it. It doesn't look like you'll be able to pass him undetected. Take him out.

pln_sh11_11_01.base_text: A contact of mine stashed a few body bags nearby just in case.
pln_sh11_11_01.loc_text: A contact of mine stashed a few body bags nearby just in case.

pln_sh11_11_03.base_text: There's a few body bags stashed nearby.
pln_sh11_11_03.loc_text: There's a few body bags stashed nearby.

pln_sh11_12_03.base_text: I got your back this time, but in the future you'll have to pay for these kinds of "special" favors. My contacts are good people and they expect good money in return.
pln_sh11_12_03.loc_text: I got your back this time, but in the future you'll have to pay for these kinds of "special" favors. My contacts are good people and they expect good money in return.

pln_sh11_14_01.base_text: Damn! Someone saw the body! Take him out before he calls it in!
pln_sh11_14_01.loc_text: Damn! Someone saw the body! Take him out before he calls it in!

pln_sh11_14_02.base_text: Damn! Someone must have found the body! Take him out before he sounds the alarm!
pln_sh11_14_02.loc_text: Damn! Someone must have found the body! Take him out before he sounds the alarm!

pln_sh11_15_01.base_text: Well, that's quite a mess all right. Now get these bodies out of sight.
pln_sh11_15_01.loc_text: Well, that's quite a mess all right. Now get these bodies out of sight.

pln_sh11_15_03.base_text: You still got your old reflexes, old friend. Quickly, get these bodies out of sight.
pln_sh11_15_03.loc_text: You still got your old reflexes, old friend. Quickly, get these bodies out of sight.

pln_sh11_16_01.base_text: Behind those crates should do. Now, get the other guy. Remember to grab another body bag.
pln_sh11_16_01.loc_text: Behind those crates should do. Now, get the other guy. Remember to grab another body bag.

pln_sh11_17_02.base_text: All right, with that taken care of it's time to find the server room.
pln_sh11_17_02.loc_text: All right, with that taken care of it's time to find the server room.

pln_sh11_18_01.base_text: God dammit! Another guy, and this one's watching the server room. I guess you have to take him out as well.
pln_sh11_18_01.loc_text: God dammit! Another guy, and this one's watching the server room. I guess you have to take him out as well.

pln_sh11_19_03.base_text: We're lucky that Control-Guy is stupid as hell, but he's getting suspicious. Next time he'll most likely sound the alarm.
pln_sh11_19_03.loc_text: We're lucky that Control-Guy is stupid as hell, but he's getting suspicious. Next time he'll most likely sound the alarm.

pln_sh11_20_03.base_text: Throw him down there where no one should find him.
pln_sh11_20_03.loc_text: Throw him down there where no one should find him.

pln_sh11_21_02.base_text: Grab the encrypted flash drive. It should be in a laptop somewhere.
pln_sh11_21_02.loc_text: Grab the encrypted flash drive. It should be in a laptop somewhere.

pln_sh11_22_02.base_text: Great. Now find something else to steal. We need to make it look like a simple robbery.
pln_sh11_22_02.loc_text: Great. Now find something else to steal. We need to make it look like a simple robbery.

pln_sh11_23_03.base_text: Excellent. We're almost done. Bear with me.
pln_sh11_23_03.loc_text: Excellent. We're almost done. Bear with me.

pln_sh11_26_03.base_text: Remember what I said: don't kill the guard. Your nonsense won't trick the Control-Guy again and he'll sound the alarm.
pln_sh11_26_03.loc_text: Remember what I said: don't kill the guard. Your nonsense won't trick the Control-Guy again and he'll sound the alarm.

pln_sh11_28_02.base_text: Easy now, Speedy Gonzales. Hang back and let him pass first.
pln_sh11_28_02.loc_text: Easy now, Speedy Gonzales. Hang back and let him pass first.

pln_sh11_29_03.base_text: Good job, Dallas. You still have it in you. Now, throw the loot in the van and let's leave.
pln_sh11_29_03.loc_text: Good job, Dallas. You still have it in you. Now, throw the loot in the van and let's leave.

pln_sh11_intro_01_01.base_text: All right, this is the place. Remember, we're here for the access codes.
pln_sh11_intro_01_01.loc_text: All right, this is the place. Remember, we're here for the access codes.

pln_sh11_intro_01_02.base_text: We're here. Get inside and get your hands on the access codes.
pln_sh11_intro_01_02.loc_text: We're here. Get inside and get your hands on the access codes.

pln_sh12_01_01.base_text: We're doing this nice and quiet. The computer we're looking for should be located on the second floor.
pln_sh12_01_01.loc_text: We're doing this nice and quiet. The computer we're looking for should be located on the second floor.

pln_sh12_03_02.base_text: We're not going in by the main entrance. You see that fence? That's our way in.
pln_sh12_03_02.loc_text: We're not going in by the main entrance. You see that fence? That's our way in.

pln_sh12_05_03.base_text: Use the ECM Jammer to disable the camera, that way you can lockpick the door undetected.
pln_sh12_05_03.loc_text: Use the ECM Jammer to disable the camera, that way you can lockpick the door undetected.

pln_sh12_08_01.base_text: Damn it, Dallas! I told you to use the ECM Jammer. Destroying it will draw unnecessary attention.
pln_sh12_08_01.loc_text: Damn it, Dallas! I told you to use the ECM Jammer. Destroying it will draw unnecessary attention.

pln_sh12_10_02.base_text: Dallas! There's a security guard outside and he's gonna see the broken camera. Take him out before he calls it in!
pln_sh12_10_02.loc_text: Dallas! There's a security guard outside and he's gonna see the broken camera. Take him out before he calls it in!

pln_sh12_11_02.base_text: Good job. Answer the pager and then hide the body in the dumpster.
pln_sh12_11_02.loc_text: Good job. Answer the pager and then hide the body in the dumpster.

pln_sh12_12_01.base_text: Now get back inside and look for the computer.
pln_sh12_12_01.loc_text: Now get back inside and look for the computer.

pln_sh12_13_03.base_text: Sneak by it and look for the security room. If we do that, we can disable all cameras at once.
pln_sh12_13_03.loc_text: Sneak by it and look for the security room. If we do that, we can disable all cameras at once.

pln_sh12_15_02.base_text: Okay, take a look around and see if you can find one.
pln_sh12_15_02.loc_text: Okay, take a look around and see if you can find one.

pln_sh12_16_02.base_text: Remember to sneak under the cameras so they won't spot you.
pln_sh12_16_02.loc_text: Remember to sneak under the cameras so they won't spot you.

pln_sh12_17_02.base_text: Time to use the keycard you picked up. Have your gun ready and take out anyone on the other side of that door.
pln_sh12_17_02.loc_text: Time to use the keycard you picked up. Have your gun ready and take out anyone on the other side of that door.

pln_sh12_18_01.base_text: Answer the pager and we should be fine. The cameras won't present any more trouble.
pln_sh12_18_01.loc_text: Answer the pager and we should be fine. The cameras won't present any more trouble.

pln_sh12_21_02.base_text: Try and get by him unnoticed. Take your time.
pln_sh12_21_02.loc_text: Try and get by him unnoticed. Take your time.

pln_sh12_22_01.base_text: Put in the flash drive and get started.
pln_sh12_22_01.loc_text: Put in the flash drive and get started.

pln_sh12_23_03.base_text: I like the sweet sound of that! Now, leave it be for a few seconds and we should be in the clear.
pln_sh12_23_03.loc_text: I like the sweet sound of that! Now, leave it be for a few seconds and we should be in the clear.

pln_sh12_24_03.base_text: Bring the flash drive with you and get out of there.
pln_sh12_24_03.loc_text: Bring the flash drive with you and get out of there.

pln_sh12_25_01.base_text: Well done, Dallas. Head to the van and get out of there.
pln_sh12_25_01.loc_text: Well done, Dallas. Head to the van and get out of there.

pln_sh12_27_02.base_text: I stashed some more body bags if you need some. Always plan ahead, Dallas. Always plan ahead.
pln_sh12_27_02.loc_text: I stashed some more body bags if you need some. Always plan ahead, Dallas. Always plan ahead.

pln_sh12_30_02.base_text: You got in and out without making a sound. Good job, Dallas. I mean it.
pln_sh12_30_02.loc_text: You got in and out without making a sound. Good job, Dallas. I mean it.

pln_sh12_brf_01_01.base_text: All right, Dallas. It's time to use those access codes we stole last night. Find a way inside the building - access the Police database and delete all the intel they have on Crime.Net. This won't be a walk in the park, so show me you still got what it takes.
pln_sh12_brf_01_01.loc_text: All right, Dallas. It's time to use those access codes we stole last night. Find a way inside the building - access the Police database and delete all the intel they have on Crime.Net. This won't be a walk in the park, so show me you still got what it takes.

pln_sh21_brf_01_01.base_text: Okay, Dallas. It's been two years since we worked together, and I need to see that you still got what it takes. We'll start with something simple, all right? An acquaintance of mine recently got robbed on a cocaine deal by some low-life mobster. I need to you to break into his night club and see if you can find the stolen cocaine and get it back. Easy, right?
pln_sh21_brf_01_01.loc_text: Okay, Dallas. It's been two years since we worked together, and I need to see that you still got what it takes. We'll start with something simple, all right? An acquaintance of mine recently got robbed on a cocaine deal by some low-life mobster. I need to you to break into his night club and see if you can find the stolen cocaine and get it back. Easy, right?

pln_tr1_01_01.base_text: That card should get you entry to one of the train railcars.
pln_tr1_01_01.loc_text: That card should get you entry to one of the train railcars.

pln_tr1_01_03.base_text: An access card. Great! That will help you get silent access to a railcar.
pln_tr1_01_03.loc_text: An access card. Great! That will help you get silent access to a railcar.

pln_tr1_02_01.base_text: We can sell those shells, if you can carry them out. But focus on the turret.
pln_tr1_02_01.loc_text: We can sell those shells, if you can carry them out. But focus on the turret.

pln_tr1_02_02.base_text: That's the ordnance, but it's not the turret. Get it out if you can, but keep looking.
pln_tr1_02_02.loc_text: That's the ordnance, but it's not the turret. Get it out if you can, but keep looking.

pln_tr1_05_02.base_text: Great. There's no shortage of buyers for these military rounds.
pln_tr1_05_02.loc_text: Great. There's no shortage of buyers for these military rounds.

pln_tr1_12_02.base_text: Great. There it is. Disassemble it and then move the pieces out.
pln_tr1_12_02.loc_text: Great. There it is. Disassemble it and then move the pieces out.

pln_tr1_13_01.base_text: Check the camera and see what's in the vault.
pln_tr1_13_01.loc_text: Check the camera and see what's in the vault.

pln_tr1_13_03.base_text: OK, we're into the railcar. Use the camera to see what's inside.
pln_tr1_13_03.loc_text: OK, we're into the railcar. Use the camera to see what's inside.

pln_tr1_19_01.base_text: Guys, get into those cars and find the one with the turret.
pln_tr1_19_01.loc_text: Guys, get into those cars and find the one with the turret.

pln_tr1_19_02.base_text: Gang, you need to locate that turret.
pln_tr1_19_02.loc_text: Gang, you need to locate that turret.

pln_tr1_22_01.base_text: Guys, you need to get those pieces to the pick-up.
pln_tr1_22_01.loc_text: Guys, you need to get those pieces to the pick-up.

pln_tr1_29_03.base_text: One high-tech, high-value piece of military badass right there.
pln_tr1_29_03.loc_text: One high-tech, high-value piece of military badass right there.

pln_tr1_brf_01_01.base_text: That blueprint you found was for a new type of infantry turret - codenamed RC1. Real next-gen shit. Digging a little deeper, I got word of a specially chartered train, headed in to the Pentagon. I've hacked the rail network, and they think they've stopped due to a glitch in the switches. Three railcars. One has the hardware. The other two have its ammo. It all sells, but your priority is the turret. They won't be expecting you.

Three railcars. One has the hardware. The other two have its ammo. It all sells, but your priority is the turret. They won't be expecting you.

pln_tr1_end_01_02.base_text: That's how the pros do it! Chalk it up. Payday Gang one, Armadillo corp zero.
pln_tr1_end_01_02.loc_text: That's how the pros do it! Chalk it up. Payday Gang one, Armadillo corp zero.

pln_tr1_intro_01_01.base_text: Find the railcar with the turret. You might be able to find an access card somewhere to speed things up.
pln_tr1_intro_01_01.loc_text: Find the railcar with the turret. You might be able to find an access card somewhere to speed things up.

pln_tr1_intro_01_02.base_text: You need to get close and locate the right railcar. Once you've ID'd it, look around - you might be able to find an access card for the railcars.
pln_tr1_intro_01_02.loc_text: You need to get close and locate the right railcar. Once you've ID'd it, look around - you might be able to find an access card for the railcars.

pln_tr1b_01_02.base_text: There's goes the alarm. And our camera feeds with it.
pln_tr1b_01_02.loc_text: There's goes the alarm. And our camera feeds with it.

pln_tr1b_01_03.base_text: Damn! Alright, I'm sending the drill.
pln_tr1b_01_03.loc_text: Damn! Alright, I'm sending the drill.

pln_tr1b_02_02.base_text: That's the turret recovered. The driver will be back for the ammo.
pln_tr1b_02_02.loc_text: That's the turret recovered. The driver will be back for the ammo.

pln_tr1b_03_01.base_text: Looks like we got everything, gang, Your pick-up is on its way.
pln_tr1b_03_01.loc_text: Looks like we got everything, gang, Your pick-up is on its way.

pln_tr1b_04_02.base_text: Each vault door has a security system, and that drive will hack it open. Should be useful.
pln_tr1b_04_02.loc_text: Each vault door has a security system, and that drive will hack it open. Should be useful.

pln_tr1b_04_03.base_text: We can hack open a train vault if you plug that hard-drive into its security panel.
pln_tr1b_04_03.loc_text: We can hack open a train vault if you plug that hard-drive into its security panel.

pln_tr1b_05_02.base_text: Alright I'm in! *whistles, impressed* These guys aren't messing around. Lots of additional firewalls.
pln_tr1b_05_02.loc_text: Alright I'm in! *whistles, impressed* These guys aren't messing around. Lots of additional firewalls.

pln_tr1b_06_01.base_text: They've blocked me. I need you to disconnect their security buffer.
pln_tr1b_06_01.loc_text: They've blocked me. I need you to disconnect their security buffer.

pln_tr1b_06_03.base_text: Another security buffer kicked in.Need to be disconnected manually.
pln_tr1b_06_03.loc_text: Another security buffer kicked in.Need to be disconnected manually.

pln_tr1b_cbf_01_01.base_text: The blueprint you found was for a new Type of Turret. It looks like the government is transporting it soon. If we act fast, we can catch them off guard and steal it without anyone noticing.
pln_tr1b_cbf_01_01.loc_text: The blueprint you found was for a new Type of Turret. It looks like the government is transporting it soon. If we act fast, we can catch them off guard and steal it without anyone noticing.

txm_man_01_01.base_text: It's nearby. Can I see the funds?
txm_man_01_01.loc_text: It's nearby. Can I see the funds?

vld_bex_01_01.base_text: You need to tell them that shit? What are they, you treat them like babies?
vld_bex_01_01.loc_text: You need to tell them that shit? What are they, you treat them like babies?

vld_bex_01_03.base_text: And bring me back some chimichangas or something!
vld_bex_01_03.loc_text: And bring me back some chimichangas or something!

vld_bex_04_01.base_text: You think they have lots of goats in Mexico?
vld_bex_04_01.loc_text: You think they have lots of goats in Mexico?

vld_bex_08_01a.base_text: I have been in the bank one time, a few years ago. The bank manager is an idiot. He keeps his access key in a personal safe, but I don't actually remember where.
vld_bex_08_01a.loc_text: I have been in the bank one time, a few years ago. The bank manager is an idiot. He keeps his access key in a personal safe, but I don't actually remember where.

vld_bex_09_01.base_text: What is taking so much time?
vld_bex_09_01.loc_text: What is taking so much time?

vld_bex_15_01.base_text: Ah, There are my precious things! Hurry, Hurry, take them!
vld_bex_15_01.loc_text: Ah, There are my precious things! Hurry, Hurry, take them!

vld_bex_15_03.base_text: You got... Is old family thing. Don't you mind... just get it out of there!
vld_bex_15_03.loc_text: You got... Is old family thing. Don't you mind... just get it out of there!

vld_bex_29_01.base_text: Just start shooting, that gets people moving!
vld_bex_29_01.loc_text: Just start shooting, that gets people moving!

vld_fex_57_04.base_text: Use your guns! Put him in the ocean to drown!
vld_fex_57_04.loc_text: Use your guns! Put him in the ocean to drown!

vld_fex_57c_01.base_text: There is old saying in Ukraine. Revenge is a dish best eaten by sharks.
vld_fex_57c_01.loc_text: There is old saying in Ukraine. Revenge is a dish best eaten by sharks.

vld_fex_intro_02_01.base_text: Oooh, it's been a long time since Vlad did a good old-fashioned revenge taking. That piece of shit Buluc is going to wish he was born in Switzerland!$NL;
vld_fex_intro_02_01.loc_text: Oooh, it's been a long time since Vlad did a good old-fashioned revenge taking. That piece of shit Buluc is going to wish he was born in Switzerland!$NL;

vld_fex_intro_04_01.base_text: Vlad is grateful you are doing this job. When this shit is over, and Buluc is dead, we get back to work for real, yes?
vld_fex_intro_04_01.loc_text: Vlad is grateful you are doing this job. When this shit is over, and Buluc is dead, we get back to work for real, yes?

vld_fex_intro_04_01a.base_text: Maybe you tell me what is going on with Bain and what you have planned next?$NL;
vld_fex_intro_04_01a.loc_text: Maybe you tell me what is going on with Bain and what you have planned next?$NL;

vld_fex_intro_04_02.base_text: Hey, Hey, HEY. Don't you wave this off. Bain and Vlad have a long history together. I care about this shit.
vld_fex_intro_04_02.loc_text: Hey, Hey, HEY. Don't you wave this off. Bain and Vlad have a long history together. I care about this shit.

vld_fex_intro_04_02a.base_text: And people are starting to talk and wonder what the hell is going on.$NL;
vld_fex_intro_04_02a.loc_text: And people are starting to talk and wonder what the hell is going on.$NL;

vld_fex_intro_04_03.base_text: Ok, ok... you just remember what I told you. Shit can come back to stalk you.$NL;
vld_fex_intro_04_03.loc_text: Ok, ok... you just remember what I told you. Shit can come back to stalk you.$NL;

vld_fex_tap05_01.base_text: Oh, that piece of shit is going to wish he had not fucked with Vlad.
vld_fex_tap05_01.loc_text: Oh, that piece of shit is going to wish he had not fucked with Vlad.

vld_fex_tap05_03.base_text: Such a waste, all this space, for that Mexican shit and his Coyopas...
vld_fex_tap05_03.loc_text: Such a waste, all this space, for that Mexican shit and his Coyopas...

vld_fex_tap05_04.base_text: This is a nice house. Would look better with some of Vlad's furniture.
vld_fex_tap05_04.loc_text: This is a nice house. Would look better with some of Vlad's furniture.
